channel.title: Commands?!?
channel.description:
yes im an admin in my testscape (who knew) and i want to know a few simple commands could anybody supply a few that would be great
*=main commands wanted to be learned *how to send players to you* *how to make other players mod in game* *how to change into monsters*

item.title: Commands?!?
item.dc:creator: @alvaroboldo alvaroboldo
item.description:
@alvaroboldo wrote:

to make someone mod or admin go into character is your source, select the name and on rigth put 1 for p-mod and 2 for admin

Read full topic

item.title: Commands?!?
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

Making players tele to you: ::xteletome [username]
Making players modâ€¦i dont think testscape comes with this command.
Changing into monsters: ::pnpc [Monster ID]

Read full topic
